name: Mental Exorcise Alpha
description:
May take some time to load on your first time playing.

ignore the quit button is doesn't work in browser mode

this is an alpha build meaning there are still some bugs and mistakes and not all the assets are currently present, but this build allows you about a third of the final story to get a feel for the mechanics.

if the game is not working in your current browser I recommend trying to play it on chrome
